caption.p: Antioxidant capacities of defatted seeds of Oenothera biennis (DSOB) and seeds of Oenothera biennis (SOB). ( A) 2,2-Azinobis(3-ethylbenzothiazoline-6-sulfonic acid) diammonium salt (ABTS) radical scavenging activity of DSOB, SOB, and Trolox (positive control). ( B) 1,1-Diphenyl-2-picrylhydrazyl (DPPH) radical scavenging activity of DSOB, SOB, and 2,6-di-tert-butyl-4-methylphenol (BHT, positive control). ( C) Hydroxyl radical (HO•) scavenging activity of DSOB, SOB, and ascorbic acid (positive control). ( D) Nitric oxide (NO) scavenging activity of DSOB, SOB, and ascorbic acid (positive control). ( E) Peroxynitrite (ONOO −) scavenging of DSOB, SOB, and ascorbic acid (positive control).
